articles.author: Ben Burrows
articles.title: Tottenham players to refund travelling fans after defeat at Newcastle United - The Athletic
articles.description:
Tottenham Hotspur’s players have pledged to refund the price of match tickets for fans who travelled away for their humiliating defeat at Newcastle United on Sunday.
Tottenham were stunned with five goals in the opening 21 minutes at St James’ Park in what wo…
